EmailTemplate.subject: Newsletter: Moving towards a SaaS way of Quality Assurance

Newsletter featuring research from Gartner: Improve Your Quality Assurance When Using SaaS
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
In recent years, we have seen a rise in Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) opportunities, allowing enterprises of all sizes to benefit from rolling out new applications while reducing costs of ownership and shortening time to market. Since SaaS places more importance on vendor reliability, often enterprises underestimate the importance of maintaining quality assurance. After all, why would you need to test a platform that has already been tested by your SaaS vendor?
Whether your enterprise focuses more on on-premise or SaaS, or even a combination of the two; testing your configurations, customizations and extensions within the platform is an essential factor for your SaaS applications. Tosca Testsuite provides test management and test automation solutions to enterprises who are currently at the cutting edge of technology and are up to date with the latest SaaS applications.
